Follow the steps of the young Fugoro in his oversky trip!\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Aurora's hobbies include mentoring future heroes, guiding the course of history and tasting new kinds of tea.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Sages sometimes see this creature in the ruins of forgotten cities.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
He appears before sages and grants their wishes. Revealing the future to their sight.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Life isn't the number of breaths you take, it's the bombs that take your breath away.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Long ago this mech was created as a defender. Now he has been reprogrammed for piracy!
A mischievous spirit that lives in the spaces between things.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Fugoro is the world's most daring merchant. He often sneaks past Orosei to steal the treasures of Pandora.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Madmen sometimes see this creature in the wildest depths of untamed forests.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
He appears before madmen and grants their wishes. Warping the forests to their whims.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
A master of warfare, Hoaka would be unbeatable if he didn't continually invent impractical new tactics.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
This mysterious sphinx watches over the cosmos and plays tutor to gods.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The Windborne Emissaries carry written prayers from the common folk up to the sacred clouds.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
A prodigy of the Djidan order, Khalim defied his masters and engaged in a worldly war.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Blades may break. Ideals will not. The King's Guards will never fall.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.

Underground Bosses are the lords of the kobold underworld. In this place where the weak serve the strong, these fearsome warriors have climbed to the top over a pile of broken rivals.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Krog believes himself to be the Ogre King. No one else does.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The world's greatest legends are mere pieces on Queen Magda's chessboard.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
While his given name is Brutar, this Ogre Battler is known to his friends as, Mr. Clubbles."\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb."
Master of all elements, this entity tests those that would enter his domain.
Some fish just want to watch the world burn.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Warlords sometimes see this creature as the sun rises on a battlefield.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
He appears before warlords and grants their wishes. Uniting the mountains under one banner.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Ruunin is the deathless guardian of the natural order. She has outlived every friend she's ever known.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Sagami count their age not in years lived, but in foes slain.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.

Seifer has burned his name into the ashes of broken kingdoms. Having conquered the devils and gained their power, Seifer enjoys nothing more than the sound of a screaming enemy.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
When she was only a child, Sharra's fear burned away with her village.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Shaytan Assassins are the messengers of the Archpriest. His message is always the same.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.

Gabrian Enchantresses wield the ancient magic of creation. Along with the Wavecrafters, they are the guardians of the spiritual balance within the Gabrian kingdom.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The Rakoa had no word for war, but Taranga knew it was something to be resisted.
Tarum was the first seed ever planted. He has seen the rise of mountains, the birth of dragons, and the fall of ancient gods.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Found in the dream of a Dragon, some believe the Egg is a sign of a brighter future. One day it will hatch.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Rakoan children laugh with the wind, dance with the waves, sleep among the leaves, and trade secrets with fire. Ulani never quite grew up.
No woodcutter buries an axe in one of these twice.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The elite of the elite. These yaks protect the balance of reality.
This yak is here to ask and answer one simple question, What's the best deck in faeria?""
Some dragons like yaks. REALLY like yaks.
Sir Yakkinton is the world's most sought after dinner guest.
You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the farmer.
A yak is happiest just before he's eaten." -The Book of Seifer"
You have the right to remain fuzzy.
In life, don't forget to stop and eat the roses.
King Yaknus, first of his name, breaker of yokes and beast of all burdens.
The legendary captain Yak Sparrow. Scourge of the seven skies.
Murderers sometimes see this creature in the hour before a slaughter.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
She appears before murderers and grants their wishes. Coating the sand with blood.\n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.

Unlock <color=white>Ulani's Realm</color> and win the loyalty of the Oversky's greatest shaman! This island gives you <color=white>4 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>7 Oversky cards</color>, a <color=white>unique ally</color> to help on your future co-op adventures, and <color=white>bonus points for your Adventure Pouch</color> (if you own one)!
Ulani's Realm Island Bundle

Unlock the <color=white>Wisplight Falls</color> and discover the secrets of the elemental spirits with Sir Yakkinton! This island gives you <color=white>4 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>7 Oversky cards</color>, a <color=white>unique ally</color> to help on your future co-op adventures, and <color=white>bonus points for your Adventure Pouch</color> (if you own one)!
Wisplight Falls Island Bundle

Unlock the island of <color=white>Pirate's Aerie</color> and challenge CAP-10, the mechanical sky pirate! This island gives you <color=white>4 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>8 Oversky cards</color>, a <color=white>unique ally</color> to help on your future co-op adventures, and <color=white>bonus points for your Adventure Pouch</color> (if you own one)!
Pirate's Aerie Island Bundle

Unlock the beautiful <color=white>Gaea's Navel</color> and reach the Tree of Everlife! This island gives you <color=white>4 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>8 Oversky cards</color>, a <color=white>unique ally</color> to help on your future co-op adventures, and <color=white>bonus points for your Adventure Pouch</color> (if you own one)!
Gaea's Navel Island Bundle

Unlock <color=white>all islands</color> in Faeria's mythical Oversky! This contains <color=white>16 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>all Oversky cards</color>, and <color=white>bonus points</color> if you own an Adventure Pouch.
Oversky Island Bundle

Unlock your <color=white>Adventure Pouch</color> and receive a free <color=white>mythic chest</color>. Gain access to the <color=white>Emperor's Daily Challenge</color>, exclusively available to Adventure Pouch owners!
Pioneer Pouch

Unlock <color=white>all islands</color> in Faeria's mythical Oversky, as well as your own Adventure Pouch! This contains <color=white>16 co-op missions</color>, <color=white>exclusive rewards</color>, the <color=white>Adventure Pouch</color>, access to the <color=white>Emperor's Daily Challenge</color>, a free mythic chest and the Adventurer's <color=white>cosmetic set</color>!
Supporter Pouch

If thou gaze long into the nightmare, the nightmare will also gaze into thee. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Peace is the only dream worth pursuing. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Explorer of the deep blue seas, of sapphire inlets, and turquoise bays. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Explorer of exotic lands, strange cultures, and foreign peoples. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
If you spend too much time in the realm of Dreams a little bit can stick to you and rainbows are hell to wash out. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
No mortal mind can withstand the pure concentrated faeria contained within the fruit of Everlife, even a mind as strong and resolute as the Emperors. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The eldest and most dedicated of the Emissaries dress in blue to show their eternal devotion to the open sky. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.

So many young warriors are ready for battle, but have no understanding of war. You can control the swing of your sword with ease, but to direct the motion of a nation is harder than swaying the sandstorm from its path. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
We need no steed, no ship, no metal machine. We mount the sky, we ride the storm! \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Any guard who is wounded in the line of duty is given a suit of silver etched armor to forever proclaim his dedication and loyalty. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Some mercenaries are more successful than others, and like everything else in kobold society, success is measured by the size of your gold pile. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
If Krog drive fast enough, then everyone following Krog. Everyone should follow Krog. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Krog dress for job he wants. Krog want to be Don. Krog is Don now! \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
The Queen knows that knowledge is power, and doesn't hesitant to spend night and day within the library to further her plans. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Ogres appreciate strength in their enemies, often adapting the clothes or markings of those they kill to honor them. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Master of all colors, this entity tests those that would enter his domain. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Born of shadows, ebon runner, always hunting, eyes of void. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Say cheese! \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Put me in, coach. I've got one hell of a swing! \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
Slaying dragons and looking good doing it. \n\nThis item unlocks a new avatar for your orb.
